name: df-repr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(crepr, cmpt(s0, cn0, cmpo(s1, s2, cpw(cn), cz, crab(s3, co(cv(s1), cmap, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(s0))), wceq(csu(s4, co(nat0, cfzo, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s3), cv(s4))), cv(s2))))))
comment: The representations of a nonnegative ` m ` as the sum of ` s ` nonnegative integers from a set ` b ` . Cf. Definition of [Nathanson] p. 123. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2021.)
